meanings.definition: A person or company that collects and processes materials to be reused or made into new products.
meanings.sent1: The recyclers picked up the old newspapers and plastic bottles for recycling.
meanings.sent2: The recyclers in our town do a great job of keeping the environment clean.
meanings.sent3: The recyclers had a race to see who could collect the most cans in a day.
meanings.sent4: The recyclers were like busy bees, buzzing around and gathering up all the recyclable items.
meanings.sent5: The recyclers were like superheroes, saving the planet one piece of trash at a time.

meanings.definition: Machines or equipment used for recycling materials.
meanings.sent1: The recyclers at the plant were working non-stop to process the plastic bottles.
meanings.sent2: The recyclers were upgraded with new technology to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The recyclers at the factory had a dance party when they processed their millionth can.
meanings.sent4: The recyclers hummed softly as they sorted through the different types of paper.
meanings.sent5: The recyclers roared to life, ready to turn trash into treasure.
